actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit

official_title: To amend the Federal Credit Union Act to allow groups which comprise the membership of any Federal credit union to continue to comprise such membership.
short_title: Federal Credit Union Membership Amendments of 1998

summary.text: Federal Credit Union Membership Amendments of 1998 - Amends the Federal Credit Union Act to permit any person or organization: (1) that is a Federal credit union member as of February 25, 1998, to retain member status after such date; and (2) that is or becomes a member of any group whose members constituted a portion of any Federal credit union membership as of that date to retain eligibility to become a credit union member by virtue of membership in a group.

titles.title: Federal Credit Union Membership Amendments of 1998
To amend the Federal Credit Union Act to allow groups which comprise the membership of any Federal credit union to continue to comprise such membership.
